manipulators.description: Change HYPER + C to left_control + C
Change HYPER + left_arrow to left_control + left_arrow
Change HYPER + right_arrow to left_control + right_arrow

rules.description: cmus to Media Keys next/play_pause/prev controls

manipulators.description: Change left_option + enter to cmus play/pause
Change left_option + left_arrow to cmus prev
Change left_option + right_arrow to cmus next

rules.description: Pok3r Map fn + number keys to their corresponding function keys.
Pok3r Arrow Keys (fn + ijkl to arrow up/left/down/right)
Pok3r Media Keys (fn + qwe to Previous/Play-Pause/Next)
Pok3r Volume Controls (fn + sdf to Volume down/up/mute)
Pok3r Escape key (grave_accent_and_tilde as Escape and fn + grave_accent_and_tilde as grave_accent_and_tilde)
